name: Hawkmoon
overview: Hawk Moon is an arcade platform game. The player assumes the role of smuggler Johnnie. The aim is to find an ancient Amulet. The parts of the amulet are located in the underground city beneath the surface of the moon. The main skill of Johnnie is the ability to long jumps which can be controlled in flight. The ability to precisely jump is very helpful in evading ubiquitous flames.
